@comment: Note the identity info given assumes use of Json Web Tokens (JWT).
Success tokens from Adobe IMS declare their own expiry timeout.
Storage of secrets in this file are for sample/exaple purposes only and are not valid values
Follow appropriate practice in production for secrets.

@descriptions_identity_fields.client_id: Copy from the Overview tab of your I/O Console Integration
@descriptions_identity_fields.client_secret: Copy from the Overview tab of your I/O Console Integration
@descriptions_identity_fields.private_key_file: The path to your local .pem or .key file
@descriptions_identity_fields.audience: Copy the 'aud' value from the JWT tab of your I/O Console Integration
@descriptions_identity_fields.claim: Copy the 'https' key from the JWT tab of your I/O Console Integration
@descriptions_identity_fields.issuer: Copy the 'iss' value from the JWT tab of your I/O Console Integration
@descriptions_identity_fields.subject: Copy the 'sub' value from the JWT tab of your I/O Console Integration

@descriptions_sample_file_fields.s3_prefix: S3 path to your sample PSD file
@descriptions_sample_file_fields.s3_rendition_prefix: Desired S3 location for your new rendition
@descriptions_sample_file_fields.s3_add_layer_prefix: Desired S3 location for your file with added layer
